summary: President John F. Kennedy kept a unique inauguration gift on his desk: a plastic-encased coconut. The tale of that coconut is the heroic story of PT 109.

Reed|Jack Richardson|Barney Ross|Dean Smith|George Takei|James Turley|Chris Washburn
keywords: heroic military|p.t. boat|south pacific|u.s. navy|navy ship
title: Patrullero PT 109
